SEARCH
Package gw.api.financials

Class CheckWizardInfoBase

java.lang.Object
gw.api.web.wizard.WizardInfo
gw.api.financials.CheckWizardInfoBase
public class CheckWizardInfoBase extends WizardInfo
This class stores wizard-scoped information for the NewCheckWizard, such as the check currently being edited and other session specific information.

  • Constructor Details

    • CheckWizardInfoBase

      public CheckWizardInfoBase()
      The basic constructor for this class

  • Method Details

    • getDeductionWarningNeeded

      public boolean getDeductionWarningNeeded()
      Flag indicating whether the deductions changed warning should be shown. In the base product, this controls whether there is a message on the instructions step of the check wizard informing the user that deductions have been recalculated.
      Returns:
      true if the deductions changed warning should be displayed, false otherwise

    • getOriginalCheckSetId

      public Key getOriginalCheckSetId()
      ID of the CheckSet associated with this Wizard. This is unused in the base product.
      Returns:
      ID of the CheckSet associated with this Wizard

    • getMarkedCheckAmount

      public CurrencyAmount getMarkedCheckAmount()
      Returns the amount of this wizard's check as of the most recent time deductions were recalculated. This is unused in the base product.
      Returns:
      check amount

    • getMarkedCheckClaimAmount

      public CurrencyAmount getMarkedCheckClaimAmount()
      Returns the claim amount of this wizard's check as of the most recent time deductions were recalculated. This is unused in the base product.
      Returns:
      check claim amount

    • getDeductionCalculatedAtLeastOnce

      public boolean getDeductionCalculatedAtLeastOnce()
      Returns true if deductions have been calculated during this trip through the Wizard. This is unused in the base product.
      Returns:
      true if deductions have been calculated at least once, false otherwise

    • getPreviouslyReceivedValidationMsgs

      public String[] getPreviouslyReceivedValidationMsgs()
      Returns an array of strings corresponding to validation messages already encountered; these will be ignored during bundle validation.
      Returns:
      array of strings corresponding to validation messages already encountered

    • getCheckPortionMap

      public HashMap getCheckPortionMap()
      Returns a cache that maps checks to whether the check's portion is a fixed portion. This is used to more quickly determine whether a check is a fixed portion or percentage portion.
      Returns:
      map of checks to whether the check's portion is a fixed portion

    • getKnownDuplicateChecks

      public Set<Check> getKnownDuplicateChecks()
      Returns the set of duplicate checks that have already been presented to the user for validation. This is unused in the base product.
      Returns:
      set containing checks that have been suggested as duplicates

    • getAllowStep1Finish

      public boolean getAllowStep1Finish()
      Indicates whether the Wizard can be finished from Step 1. In the base product, this is used on the first step of the QuickCreateCheckWizard. It is set to false when a user attempts to finish from Step 1 and there are deductions.
      Returns:
      true if this wizard can be completed from step 1, false otherwise

    • setCheckSet

      public void setCheckSet(CheckSet checkset)
      Sets the CheckSet with which this wizard is associated.
      Parameters:
      checkset - the CheckSet with which this wizard should be associated

    • setOriginalCheckSetId

      public void setOriginalCheckSetId(Key originalID)
      Set the id of the CheckSet with which this wizard is associated. This setter is used in the base product, but its corresponding getter is not.
      Parameters:
      originalID - id of the CheckSet with which this wizard should be associated

    • setMarkedCheckAmount

      public void setMarkedCheckAmount(CurrencyAmount currencyamount)
      Sets the check amount. Subsequent access to the marked check amount will return this amount, without taking into account new deductions that may need to be computed until the marked amount is updated again. This is unused in the base product.
      Parameters:
      currencyamount - the check amount to set

    • setMarkedCheckClaimAmount

      public void setMarkedCheckClaimAmount(CurrencyAmount currencyamount)
      Sets the check claim amount. Subsequent access to the marked check claim amount will return this amount, without taking into account new deductions that may need to be computed until the marked amount is updated again. This is unused in the base product.
      Parameters:
      currencyamount - the check claim amount to set

    • setDeductionCalculatedAtLeastOnce

      public void setDeductionCalculatedAtLeastOnce(boolean bool)
      Sets whether deductions have been calculated during this trip through the Wizard. This is unused in the base product.
      Parameters:
      bool - whether deductions have been calculated at least once

    • setPreviouslyReceivedValidationMsgs

      public void setPreviouslyReceivedValidationMsgs(String[] str)
      Sets an array of validation messages that have been encountered and should be ignored during bundle validation.
      Parameters:
      str - array of strings corresponding to the validation messages to be ignored

    • setCheckPortionMap

      public void setCheckPortionMap(HashMap hashmap)
      Sets the cache that maps checks to whether their portions are fixed portions. The map is used to speed up lookup of check portion types in the base product, but this setter is unused.
      Parameters:
      hashmap - map of checks to fixed portion flags

    • setKnownDuplicateChecks

      public void setKnownDuplicateChecks(Set<Check> checks)
      Sets the collection of duplicate checks that have already been presented to the user for validation. This is unused in the base product.
      Parameters:
      checks - set of checks that were suggested as duplicates

    • setAllowStep1Finish

      public void setAllowStep1Finish(boolean bool)
      Sets boolean that controls whether the Wizard can be finished from Step 1. This is unused in the base product, but its corresponding getter is used in the QuickCreateCheckWizard.
      Parameters:
      bool - whether the wizard can be finished from Step 1

    • getCheckSet

      public CheckSet getCheckSet()
      Returns the CheckSet being edited by the associated CheckWizard.
      Returns:
      the CheckSet being edited

    • getCheck

      public Check getCheck()
      Returns the check that is being edited by the associated CheckWizard.
      Returns:

    • containsPaymentOnAccountCheck

      public boolean containsPaymentOnAccountCheck()

    • setCheck

      public void setCheck(Check check)
      Sets the check to be edited by the CheckWizard.
      Parameters:
      check - Check to set

    • getCheckGroupProxy

      public Check getCheckGroupProxy(InvocationHandler handler)
      On the final page of the check wizard, there are values which need to be copied from the primary check to the secondary checks (if any). This is done by using a Proxy (in place of the actual check) which applies any setXXX methods to all of the checks in the group, but passes all other methods to the primary check alone.
      Returns:
      the Check proxy to use for this copy operation

    • exposureHasPendingFinalPayment

      public boolean exposureHasPendingFinalPayment(Exposure exp, CostType costType, Payment payment)
      Pass-through method to Exposure.hasPendingFinalPayment(CostType, Payment)
      Parameters:
      exp - The Exposure for which deductions should be computed.
      costType - The CostType for which deductions should be computed.
      payment - The Payment for which deductions should be computed.

    • claimHasClaimLevelPendingFinalPayment

      public boolean claimHasClaimLevelPendingFinalPayment(Claim claim, CostType costType, CostCategory costCategory, Payment payment)
      Pass-through method to Exposure.claimHasClaimLevelPendingFinalPayment(Claim,CostType,CostCategory,Payment)
      Parameters:
      claim - The Claim for which deductions should be computed.
      costType - The CostType for which deductions should be computed.
      costCategory - The CostCategory for which deductions should be computed.
      payment - The Payment for which deductions should be computed.

    • createNewCheckPortionsIfNecessary

      public void createNewCheckPortionsIfNecessary()
      For all modified check portions in this wizard's CheckSet, check if a new portion should be created. If so, a new portion is created with the current portion's values, and the appropriate check's portion is set to the new portion. The old portion's changed fields are reverted.

    • deleteCheck

      public void deleteCheck(Check check)
      Removes the indicated check from the CheckGroup being edited. This is equivalent to removing a payee from a multi-payee check.
      Parameters:
      check - the Check to delete

    • deletePayment

      public void deletePayment(Payment payment)
      Removes the indicated payment from the check being edited. If this was the last payment for this check, a new one is added.
      Parameters:
      payment - the Payment to be removed from the check.

    • addAdditionalPayee

      public Check addAdditionalPayee(CheckGroup checkGroup)
      Adds a new payee to the check being edited. This is logically equivalent to adding a new check to the indicated CheckGroup.
      Parameters:
      checkGroup - the CheckGroup to which the new payee's associated check should be added as a member.
      Returns:
      the new check for this additional payee

    • addAdditionalPayment

      public Payment addAdditionalPayment()
      Adds an additional payment to the check being edited.
      Returns:
      the newly created payment

    • calculateDeductions

      protected void calculateDeductions() throws com.guidewire.cc.domain.financials.adapter.exception.DeductionAdapterException
      Recalculates Deductions, re-setting the reportable amount first if the gross amount has changed.

      com.guidewire.cc.domain.financials.adapter.exception.DeductionAdapterException

    • copyCheckPortionInfo

      protected boolean copyCheckPortionInfo()
      Tests whether the check portion settings entered in the widget should be copied into the check being edited. Overridden as necessary by subclasses.
      Returns:
      TRUE if the copy should occur, else FALSE

    • setDeductionWarningNeeded

      public void setDeductionWarningNeeded(boolean deductionWarningNeeded)
      Sets the flag to indicate whether a warning is necessary for the user if the deductions have changed on the check being edited.
      Parameters:
      deductionWarningNeeded - the value to set into the deduction warning needed flag

    • markCheckAmount

      protected void markCheckAmount()
      Records the current check amount. If the deductions are to be automatically recalculated, it first checks if the check total amount is different from the last marked amount.

    • clearMarkedCheckAmount

      protected void clearMarkedCheckAmount()
      Forces deductions to be recalculated.

    • isCheckAmountChanged

      protected boolean isCheckAmountChanged()

    • refreshBundle

      public void refreshBundle()
      Refreshes any read-only beans in the wizard's bundle. This can be used to update financials amounts that have changed since the wizard was started.

    • changeNumPaymentsOnly

      protected boolean changeNumPaymentsOnly()
      Tests whether the Num Payments option for a recurrence should be the only editable field. Overridden as necessary by subclasses.
      Returns:
      TRUE if only the Num Payments field should be editable in the recurrence options, else FALSE.

      Throws:
      Exception

    • searchForDuplicates

      public void searchForDuplicates()
      Search for checks that are possible duplicates to the check currently being created. Any potential matches that are found are displayed in a worksheet for the user to review.

    • searchForDuplicates

      public void searchForDuplicates(boolean throwIfDuplicates)
      Search for checks that are possible duplicates to the check currently being created. Any potential matches that are found are displayed in a worksheet for the user to review.
      Parameters:
      throwIfDuplicates - will throw an exception if duplicates are found. This stops the wizard at the current step

    • step1OnFinish

      public void step1OnFinish()
      Throws an exception to display a warning if Deductions exist on the current Check. Called by setInstructionDefaults() if Finish has been clicked.

      Parameters:

    • validatePayments

      public void validatePayments()
      Verifies that each payment has a reserve line, a payment type, at least one line item, and that each line item has an amount. If problems are found during this verification, then a UserDisplayableException is thrown containing an appropriate error message.

    • validateAllCheckPayees

      public void validateAllCheckPayees()
      Validates the check payees for every check in the checkset being edited. Throws a UserDisplayableException with relevant error message if a problem is found.

    • getCheckGroupProxy

      public Check getCheckGroupProxy()
      On the final page of the check wizard, there are values which need to be copied from the primary check to the secondary checks (if any). This is done by using a Proxy (in place of the actual check) which applies any setXXX methods to all of the checks in the group, but passes all other methods to the primary check alone.
      Returns:
      the Check proxy to use for this copy operation
